title: Reset a streaming dataset in Power BI (Minute Monday)
excerpt: In this Minute Monday, Patrick shows you how to reset data that is within a streaming datset in Power BI. He figured this out when trying to setup a demo with a streaming dataset and then wanting to start over.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube
